name: BOX BLAST
description:
Try to get the high score in this fast paced bullet hell game.

WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to fire!

Shift to use FOCUS

Every ten seconds your weapon will switch. Play around with the weapons
 and find starts.

The white weapon means you have to bash into enemies yourself (you become the bullet!). Felt like I had to explain that cause I didn't get time to put proper instructions or a guide for that lol. The others are pretty self-explanatory.

This was made for the bullet hell jam and was a very fun game to make. Would have been better if I didn't procrastinate half the week but what can you do lol

The Windows version is most recommended as it has the highscores intact and is the version I have tested the most. I have not (yet) tested the Linux build so there could be a lot of bugs with that or it might not work at all.
